title: Israel Army Says Nation On Alert After Claiming It Killed Hezbollah Chief
content: The Israeli military said on Saturday Israel is on high alert for a broader conflict after it claimed to have killed Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut, and also said it hoped his reported death will cause the group to change course.
summary: The Israeli military said on Saturday Israel is on high alert for a broader conflict after it claimed to have killed Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah in Beirut, and also said it hoped his reported death will cause the group to change course.

title: Iran's Supreme Leader Moved After Israel Claims Hezbollah Chief Killed
content: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has been transferred to a secure location inside the country with heightened security measures in place, two regional officials briefed by Tehran told Reuters.
summary: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has been transferred to a secure location inside the country with heightened security measures in place, two regional officials briefed by Tehran told Reuters.

title: Hassan Nasrallah Is Dead. This Cleric Is Now Tipped To Lead Hezbollah
content: Hassan Nasrallah is dead, Israel claimed today. The Hezbollah chief's death has not been confirmed by the Iran-backed, Lebanon-based group but Israeli military have claimed that their airstrikes on Beirut last night killed the 64-year-old.
summary: Hassan Nasrallah is dead, Israel claimed today. The Hezbollah chief's death has not been confirmed by the Iran-backed, Lebanon-based group but Israeli military have claimed that their airstrikes on Beirut last night killed the 64-year-old.

title: Israel Says Hezbollah Chief Dead: "Will No Longer Terrorise The World"
content: Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah was killed in a strike on Beirut, the Israeli military said today.
summary: Hezbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah was killed in a strike on Beirut, the Israeli military said today.

title: UK Couple Kicked Off Plane For Indulging In "Sexual Activity"
content: Both Bradley, 22, and Antonia, 20, pleaded guilty this week to a charge of outraging public decency by committing a sexual act in a public place.
summary: Both Bradley, 22, and Antonia, 20, pleaded guilty this week to a charge of outraging public decency by committing a sexual act in a public place.

title: 6 Killed In Russian Attacks On Medical Centre, Says Ukraine
content: Two consecutive Russian attacks on a medical centre in Sumy in northeastern Ukraine on Saturday morning killed six people, Ukraine's interior minister said.
summary: Two consecutive Russian attacks on a medical centre in Sumy in northeastern Ukraine on Saturday morning killed six people, Ukraine's interior minister said.

title: New Revelations About Princess Diana, Rumours On Harry's "Biological Father"
content: Princess Diana's hairdresser has weighed in on the controversy surrounding Prince Harry and her riding instructor James Hewitt.
summary: Princess Diana's hairdresser has weighed in on the controversy surrounding Prince Harry and her riding instructor James Hewitt.

title: Ukraine Says Downed 69 Drones, 2 Missiles In Overnight Russian Attack
content: Ukraine shot down 69 of 73 drones during an overnight Russian attack that included two ballistic and two cruise missiles, the Ukrainian air force said on Saturday.
summary: Ukraine shot down 69 of 73 drones during an overnight Russian attack that included two ballistic and two cruise missiles, the Ukrainian air force said on Saturday.

title: Vietnam Estimates Damages Of $3.31 Billion From Typhoon Yagi: Report
content: Asia's strongest storm this year, Typhoon Yagi, caused damages estimated at 81.5 trillion dong ($3.31 billion) across northern Vietnam, or twice as much as previous estimates, state media said on Saturday.
summary: Asia's strongest storm this year, Typhoon Yagi, caused damages estimated at 81.5 trillion dong ($3.31 billion) across northern Vietnam, or twice as much as previous estimates, state media said on Saturday.

title: Harris Vows To Fix US Immigration System, Trump Says "This Is Bad Timing"
content: Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris has vowed to impose tougher security measures at the border and fix America's broken immigration system
summary: Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris has vowed to impose tougher security measures at the border and fix America's broken immigration system

title: "Scaring Customers": Man With Facial Disfigurement Told To Leave Restaurant
content: Oliver Bromley had just completed a treatment session at King's College Hospital in southeast London and decided to grab lunch at a nearby eatery.
summary: Oliver Bromley had just completed a treatment session at King's College Hospital in southeast London and decided to grab lunch at a nearby eatery.

title: India's "Inevitable Consequences" Warning After Shehbaz Sharif's UN Speech
content: India issued a stern warning to Pakistan today at the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) following Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif's speech, in which he raised the Jammu and Kashmir issue.
summary: India issued a stern warning to Pakistan today at the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) following Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif's speech, in which he raised the Jammu and Kashmir issue.

title: Earth's 'Mini Moon' To Be Visible On September 29. Here's How To Watch It
content: Mini-moons have been spotted before, and many more are likely to have gone unnoticed.
summary: Mini-moons have been spotted before, and many more are likely to have gone unnoticed.

title: 173 Hongkongers Say They Were Attacked With Bodily Fluids Over 8 Months
content: A court fined 26-year-old PhD student Lai Changwei HK$5,000 for squirting a liquid containing his semen onto a woman.
summary: A court fined 26-year-old PhD student Lai Changwei HK$5,000 for squirting a liquid containing his semen onto a woman.

title: Netanyahu's Maps At UN Show India As "Blessing", Iran And Iraq As "Curse"
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu stood at the podium of the United Nations General Assembly in New York on Friday, holding two maps.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu stood at the podium of the United Nations General Assembly in New York on Friday, holding two maps.

title: As Israel Bombards Beirut, Hezbollah Chief's Daughter Reportedly Killed
content: Israel continued ferocious rounds of airstrikes on Hezbollah's key strongholds in southern Beirut in Lebanon today. These strikes, which began last night in the heart of the capital city, sent plumes of thick smoke billowing into the sky.
summary: Israel continued ferocious rounds of airstrikes on Hezbollah's key strongholds in southern Beirut in Lebanon today. These strikes, which began last night in the heart of the capital city, sent plumes of thick smoke billowing into the sky.

title: Gisele Pelicot: The New French Feminist Icon In Landmark Rape Trial
content: Chants of several women hailing Gisele Pelicot as the emerging feminist icon filled the air as the 72-year-old walked into a courtroom for her mass rape trial in Avignon, France.
summary: Chants of several women hailing Gisele Pelicot as the emerging feminist icon filled the air as the 72-year-old walked into a courtroom for her mass rape trial in Avignon, France.

title: Iran Denounces Israel Attack On Lebanon As "Flagrant War Crime"
content: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian condemned Israel's air strikes on the Lebanese capital's densely populated southern suburbs Friday as a "flagrant war crime."
summary: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian condemned Israel's air strikes on the Lebanese capital's densely populated southern suburbs Friday as a "flagrant war crime."

title: Communication Lost With Hezbollah Head After Israel's Airstrike: Report
content: Hezbollah's head Hassan Nasrallah was unreachable following Israel's strikes on Beirut's southern suburbs on Friday evening, a source close to the Lebanese armed group told Reuters.
summary: Hezbollah's head Hassan Nasrallah was unreachable following Israel's strikes on Beirut's southern suburbs on Friday evening, a source close to the Lebanese armed group told Reuters.

title: Trump Vows To Prosecute Google For Showing "Bad Stories" On Him
content: Donald Trump on Friday accused Google of showing only "bad stories" about him and vowed to have the tech giant prosecuted if he gets back in the White House.
summary: Donald Trump on Friday accused Google of showing only "bad stories" about him and vowed to have the tech giant prosecuted if he gets back in the White House.
